This post provides an overview of the anchorpipe project roadmap and current status.

## Current Focus

**‚úÖ Gate G0 (Foundation) - COMPLETE!**

We've successfully completed the foundation phase. All infrastructure, database, CI/CD, authentication, and basic services are in place.

**üéØ Next: Gate GA (Security Foundation)**

Focusing on security foundations, RBAC, encryption, and compliance.

## Roadmap Overview

### ‚úÖ Gate G0: Foundation (COMPLETE)
**Status**: ‚úÖ Complete  
**Timeline**: Completed

- Repository setup and development environment
- PostgreSQL schema and migrations
- CI/CD pipeline
- Basic authentication system
- API Gateway / BFF
- Message queue (RabbitMQ)
- Object storage (S3-compatible)
- Basic telemetry and logging

### üéØ Gate GA: Security Foundation (Next)
**Status**: Planning  
**Timeline**: Upcoming

- Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
- Encryption at rest and in transit
- Enhanced input validation
- Security audit logging
- Compliance foundations
- Security testing and scanning

### üìã Gate GB: Core Platform
**Status**: Planned  
**Timeline**: After GA

- GitHub App integration
- CI/CD platform integrations
- Test ingestion pipeline
- Data processing and storage
- API endpoints for core features

### üöÄ Gate GC: MVP (General Availability)
**Status**: Planned  
**Timeline**: After GB

- Advanced flake scoring algorithms
- MVP Dashboard
- GitHub PR Bot
- Real-time notifications
- Performance optimizations

### üåü Gate GD: Post-MVP Enhancements
**Status**: Planned  
**Timeline**: After GC

- Plugin ecosystem
- Advanced analytics
- Enterprise features
- Additional integrations

## How We Plan

### Gate-Based Development
We use a gate-based approach where each gate represents a milestone:

- **G0**: Foundation (internal/alpha)
- **GA**: Security Foundation (private beta)
- **GB**: Core Platform (public beta)
- **GC**: MVP (general availability)
- **GD**: Post-MVP enhancements

### Project Board
Track our progress on the [GitHub Project Board](https://github.com/orgs/anchorpipe/projects/3/views/2).

### Epics and Stories
Work is organized into:
- **Epics**: Large bodies of work spanning multiple stories
- **Stories**: Smaller, implementable units of work
- **Tasks**: Technical tasks and chores

## Feedback and Ideas

We value community input! Here's how you can contribute:

- **Feature Ideas**: Share in [Ideas](https://github.com/anchorpipe/anchorpipe/discussions/categories/ideas)
- **RFCs**: Propose major changes in [RFCs](https://github.com/anchorpipe/anchorpipe/discussions/categories/rfcs)
- **Questions**: Ask in [Q&A](https://github.com/anchorpipe/anchorpipe/discussions/categories/q-a)
- **Show Your Work**: Share in [Show and Tell](https://github.com/anchorpipe/anchorpipe/discussions/categories/show-and-tell)

## Timeline Estimates

- **Gate GA**: Estimated 2-3 months
- **Gate GB**: Estimated 3-4 months
- **Gate GC (MVP)**: Estimated 4-6 months
- **Gate GD**: Ongoing

*Note: Timelines are estimates and may change based on priorities, resources, and community feedback.*
